category.name: Product Structure.Design Context Interoperability
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DesignContextBOMWriterNoDescendantsInPLMXML
preference.preference_description: Defines if PLMXML files, generated by the BOM Writer for interoperability (open in NX) in the Design Context application, should have descendants of the selected BOM Lines. Valid Values: true - The descendants of the selected BOM Lines will not appear in the generated PLMXML file. false - The descendants of the selected BOM Lines will appear in the generated PLMXML file.
